title: Kicked out of games
body:
Recently Ive been randomly been kicked out of games, so when this happens it says attempting  to reconnect which it usually doesn't. I exit out of the game and try to reopen it, but when I do it says unspecified error has occurred which I'm not happy about because I have a 20 min ban now for it and does anyone know how I can fix this.

and I have great internet so thats not a problem

replies.body:
Even if you have a great connection to other services or sites, you could still have a poor connection to the League servers. This is because servers for different sites and games are located in different places. I recommend you try the solutions in [our Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) in order to resolve this.

Let me know if you have questions.

I live right by the chicago servers with 30ms and 60fps and its only started doing this during the patch note before this

 also checked the severs for how good my connect was to them and it seemed to me i had a great connection I have also went through the steps and I still found it kept saying that there is some sort of error not connection problem

Generally, when you see a sudden change in your connection to a particular server or service, it's caused by routing changes by your ISP. Since patches only change local files on your PC, it's extremely unlikely the patch would have affected your connection. If you're not seeing any changes after working through the connection guide, I suggest reaching out to our tech specialists by [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with a set of logs using our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs) and the URL to a completed [Network Analysis.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq1)

If you have any issues submitting your ticket with logs, let me know.
I've also had it randomly disconnect and then reconnect which takes a toll on my match history
